Reviews.Title: Good phone
Reviews.Author: Jorge Gonzalez Bou
Reviews.Content: The product is ok, I did not have any issues on it other than the battery does not last more than 1 or 2 days, but the phones are refurbished even though it did not state that on the product description.

Reviews.Title: Nokia 5300
Reviews.Author: Krickett
Reviews.Content: I haven't had this phone very long, but so far, I absolutely love it.  I ordered it as "unlocked" because it is a "T-Mobile" phone, but it works perfectly with my AT&T; network.  I opted for this phone because I wear dual hearing aids and use a streamer for blue tooth connectivity; this phone offers stereo blue tooth capability, with music, so I'm able to listen to my music wirelessly.  It's great!

Reviews.Title: Bad Cell Phone
Reviews.Author: Kwasi Owusu
Reviews.Content: Received this phone from JR and it came without a box and it was not working. I am still waiting for an exchange or refund after 1 MONTH. What a service!!!!

Reviews.Title: Good phone!!
Reviews.Author: Lili_08
Reviews.Content: This phone is perfect it works better. Good quality. Small but the speaker is strong. Overall, good simple phone for everyday use.

Reviews.Title: failure
Reviews.Author: Peace C. Anosike
Reviews.Content: I will want express my disappointment over JR electronics that I bought from. They just sent aa phone with out the manual. Instead I was given a wrong manual. the accessories as listed are not in the package delivered. Please kindly send the manual to the address or I will return the phone
